pullrequest.title: [A-3] Dockerfile and supporting scripts for building ign-gazebo

content.raw:
If this is a valid thing to include here in this repository, I will also update the readme \(or create a separate one for docker\)

To build with the subdirectory:

`docker build . -f ./docker/Dockerfile.base -t ign-gazebo:base`  
`docker build . -f ./docker/Dockerfile.nightly -t ign-gazebo:nightly`

Then run with:

`docker run -it ign-gazebo:nightly /bin/bash`

If this is a valid thing to include here in this repository, I will also update the readme (or create a separate one for docker)

To build with the subdirectory:

docker build . -f ./docker/Dockerfile.base -t ign-gazebo:base
docker build . -f ./docker/Dockerfile.nightly -t ign-gazebo:nightly

Then run with:
